record.dc:title: 73BY11 Rymer, Bradley County, Tennessee. Burial 15BY127, a juvenile male with broken pottery vessel (F.S. 1705) lying near the right shoulder. Square 28R5. Direction SW.
record.wpa:narrative: Juvenile male in fair condition, extended on back with head to NW. Deposited in bottom of pit 0.2' below 15BY123.
